data.name: Pardus style remake 2.0
data.description:
This is almost a complete remake 2.0 of css for the game Pardus with more of everything with a cherry on top.

* Make sure you use "Stylus" or you can try it as userscript . Both ways will protect your privacy *
* make sure you install http://gramajda.hekko24.pl/p/pardus/teutonnormalce.ttf font *
Some of the features:
- colors with --var_iables so you can fiddle with them to your liking (initial introduction)
- nav grid and highlight of mouse-hovered fields
- Some of links positioned fixed for convenient access
- Makes Bulletin boards look compact in a way (to disable, you have to delete everything from bulletin boards comment to tables comment)
- better space usage in some places

This probably works faster as userstyle used via Stylus rather than a userScript

data.name: Roll20 Hide Toolbar Buttons
data.description: Use this one with caution. The intent is to use this to hide specific toolbar buttons, but the default installation hides ALL buttons. Install and then delete the code blocks for the buttons you wish to *keep*.

data.name: DuckDuck-"Go Weegee!"
Osu!daily Dark
data.description: Makes the site osu!daily a little easier on the eyes

data.name: Blog Diolinux Dark
data.description: Um design dark, agradável aos olhos para o blog <a href="https://diolinux.com.br">Diolinux<a/>. Desenvolvido por <a href="https://mamf.com.br/estudio">MamfEstúdio<a/>

data.name: Dynalist to Workflowy
data.description:
Personally don't like the default style, but do not want to use Workflowy for its slow speed. So here is a stylish to create a Workflowy style(more compact, more elegant, simpler to read). Edited base on some stylish such as Dynalist-Light, so thanks to these author.
个人不喜欢默认风格，但因为Workflowy速度太慢而不想继续用。所以带来这个Workflowy风格的界面（更紧凑，更优雅，更简洁）。利用了部分Stylish现有部分风格的代码，感谢这些作者。

data.name: Yellow Wall aesthetic
Queen Roblox
data.description: Its a (hopefully) working wallpaper for roblox

data.name: NooksGuide.com Dark Mode
data.description: For people use NooksGuide.com and like to play at night, or just like dark themes like I do. It's super minimal I know; that's how I wanted it! Please send recommendations or custom options you'd like to see on Twitter and thanks for checking out my style! 🦉

data.name: Depfu Dark Mode
data.description:
A simple and clean Dark mode for depfu.com, a dependency manager for open source projects. Only applies to the Depfu dashboard, not the homepage!!

Current version: v1.0.3

data.name: Cutesy (gray)
data.description: Uses the layout of Jon Lachney's Typeracer Remix themes. Squiggly underline is visible on "Old-style 1" display format (see thumbnail).
